ol.li:
Contains zero or more [0..*] id with data type Id
A unique identifier that the payer or information source can use to identify the person as a Policy Holder.
Contains exactly one [1..1] healthPlan, where its type is Health Plan
Contains exactly one [1..1] network, where its type is Network
